name: Wood Wars [Pre-Alpha]
description:
1896-Gregoryville

The wooden war has started,you are an woodsman who will help your allies create and destroy treehouses and fortresses.Your boss Mr. Franklin O'Neil is wanting you to destroy Mr.George McKin wooden transport job by killing his own employees (Due to an bet he lose....)Will you kill them? Or let them kill you?

Features:

Multiplayer Shooter because why not?

2D Platformer,just like the good ol' ones

No IGP (In Game Purchasing)!!!

Your own weapons and accesories! (Custom Shop)

FREE TO PLAY!

*Note:This game does not try to recreate VALVe's(TM) Team Fortress 2(C) in any way nor iclude their artwork,levels or ingame objects.Original game made by: Cristi Ungureanu,Sliced Pizza Software,2015 all right reserved*
